globalForcedModel.label: Global Forced Model Routing
globalForcedModel.description: Rewrite target model for all requests
globalForcedModel.helpText: All API Key requests without individual forced routing settings will be forced to route to this model.

claudeCodeOnly.title: Allow Claude Code Client Only
claudeCodeOnly.description: Once enabled, all /api/v1/messages and /claude/v1/messages endpoints will enforce Claude Code CLI client validation
claudeCodeOnly.hint: This setting works in OR logic with API Key level client restrictions: if enabled globally OR in API Key settings, Claude Code validation will be enforced.

sessionBinding.title: Force Session Binding
sessionBinding.description: Once enabled, the system will bind the original session ID to the account used for the first time, ensuring context consistency
sessionBinding.ttlHelp: Validity period after session is bound to account, automatically unbound after expiration
sessionBinding.errorHelp: Warning message returned to client when a stale sessionId is detected without scheduling record in the system
sessionBinding.howItWorksDesc: The system extracts the original session ID from the request (metadata.user_id) and binds it to the first scheduled account. Subsequent requests with the same session ID will be automatically routed to the same account.
sessionBinding.newSessionIdDesc: If the sessionId is not in the binding history but the request contains messages.length > 1, the system considers it a contaminated session and rejects the request.

messageQueue.title: User Message Serial Queue
messageQueue.description: Once enabled, user message requests for the same account will be executed serially with delays between requests to prevent triggering upstream rate limits
messageQueue.delayHelp: Minimum interval time between user message requests for the same account (0-10000ms)
messageQueue.timeoutHelp: Maximum wait time for request in queue, returns 503 error on timeout (1000-300000ms)
messageQueue.howItWorksDesc: The system detects if the role of the last message in the request is 'user'...

routing.title: Smart Routing Wizard
routing.description: Configure intelligent model redirection rules visually.

siteName.label: Site Name
siteName.helpText: Will be displayed in browser title and page header

adminButton.label: Admin Entry
adminButton.helpText: Once hidden, users need to directly access /admin/login page to log in

mainSwitch.title: Enable Notifications
mainSwitch.description: Once enabled, the system will send notifications to specified platforms according to configuration

accountExpiring.name: Account Expiring
accountExpiring.description: Notify when an account is near its expiration date

accountExpired.name: Account Expired
accountExpired.description: Notify when an account has expired

accountError.name: Account Error
accountError.description: Notify when there is an account error

accountDisabled.name: Account Disabled
accountDisabled.description: Notify when an account is disabled

rateLimitReached.name: Rate Limit Reached
rateLimitReached.description: Notify when rate limit is reached

apiKeyExpiring.name: API Key Expiring
apiKeyExpiring.description: Notify when an API key is near its expiration date

apiKeyExpired.name: API Key Expired
apiKeyExpired.description: Notify when an API key has expired

systemError.name: System Error
systemError.description: Notify when a system error occurs

platforms.title: Notification Platforms
platforms.emptyDescription: Click the button above to add your first notification platform

deletePlatform.title: Confirm Deletion
deletePlatform.message: Are you sure you want to delete this notification platform?

siteIcon.title: Site Icon
siteIcon.description: Upload a custom icon or enter an icon URL

adminEntry.title: Admin Entry
adminEntry.description: Control login button display on the home page
